title: Anyone know what day exactly in 1957 Neue Haas Grotesk (Helvetica) was released?
content:
Not sure if it received a proper release date but thought I’d see what some of you might know on the first year of Helvetica.

Thanks.

 [‹ Sorting fonts by category?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205013045/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33733 "Go to previous forum topic") [Five Steps to Font Freedom ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205013045/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18418 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Biff

comments.content: Biff you need to see [Helvetica: The Film](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205013045/http:/typophile.com/node/27479).
